item.title: ACE Thought-Weaving Framework
item.description: Reference Source: [[1. Resource Notes/LYT 10 MOC]] Keywords: [[permanent notes]] Relevant Notes: Notes Definitions ACE stands for… Add Connect Express You can define these in your own ways with your own verbs… A - resonate, plant, encounter C - gather, contextualize, distill E - WEAVE, craft, transform I would just call my own ACE process gardening Exercise Producer What are your PKM/creative/work goals?
